title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama: chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration: use Ollama models as LLMs, chat or embedding endpoints inside any LangChain pipeline.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, dark mode, mobile friendly).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; offers synchronous & async APIs, model pull, chat, generate, embeddings.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama + Chroma: ingest PDFs, embed with Ollama, chat over documents.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub Copilot-like inline code assistant.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with syntax highlighting, chat history, markdown rendering and prompt templates.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection, PVC and ingress out-of-box.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix package derivation for Ollama; pin versions, reproducible builds, CUDA and ROCm variants.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration: OllamaGenerator & OllamaChatGenerator for end-to-end LLM pipelines.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that chats, generates images and pulls new models via slash commands to Ollama.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bot integration: mention the bot or use /ollama slash command to chat with any local model.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing strongly-typed async client for Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET library and CLI for Ollama: chat, generate, pull models, streaming, with ready-made DI extensions.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir wrapper leveraging Finch/Tesla for chat, generate, embeddings and model management.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Streamlit chatbot template combining Ollama LLM, HuggingFace embeddings and FAISS for private RAG.

title: ollama-github-actions
summary: GitHub Action to install and start Ollama in CI, cache models and run LLM-powered tests.
